Modular Evolution

Modular Evoltuion

Learn by doing. Teach by showing.

Wicked Johnny

Platform: Mobile

Technology: Unreal Engine

Key concepts

Satisfying combat. Character starts off ranged, but can evolve to melee. Movement should evoke a carefully-timed choreography.

Character is relatable. Primary motivation is personal.

Mechanics

User controls actions, not movement.
